alert.note: Alert for Cole (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 1:49PM CDT until April 20 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN COLE...SOUTHEASTERN BOONE AND SOUTHWESTERN CALLAWAY COUNTIES... At 149 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Martins, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jefferson City, Ashland, Holts Summit, Columbia Regional Airport, St. Martins, New Bloomfield, Lake Mykee Town, Centertown, Lake Mykee, Marion, Lohman, Hartsburg, Elston, Wilton, and Guthrie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
